name: WILDLFIRE INDUSTRY COLLECTIVE
description: Collective organization for wildfire management and advocacy.
sampleDescriptions: Educate and advocate congress on wildfire management, spending accountability and transparency. Promote industry innovation of PPE and wildfire management and advanced firefighting tools.
